description: A 9-year-old boy was the sole survivor after a teenage driver veered off the road. The victims ranged in age from 8 to 17, the police said.
title: 5 Young People Are Killed in Car Crash in Westchester County
title_page: 5 Young People Are Killed in Car Crash in Westchester County - The New York Times
maintext:
A fiery crash on the Hutchinson River Parkway took the lives of five young people in the early hours of Sunday morning, according to the Westchester County police.
A sixth child, a 9-year-old boy who was riding in the rear hatchback area of the Nissan Rogue that crashed, survived and was taken to Westchester Medical Center. The boyâ€™s injuries are not life-threatening, the police said.
The five dead children, four male and one female, ranged in age from 8 to 17. The driver was 16, the police said.
It appeared that they were all from one family, according to Matt Conway, the superintendent of the public school system in Derby, Conn., where the police said the children lived.
